Articles.Content:
So... just recorded one of the most bizarre glitches I've ever seen. I explain a bit more in the video here. It's only about 2 minutes long.

But basically - Jumping Bean Kerbals! The Kraken has invaded the KSC airspace!

Anybody else seen something like this??

Nifty break dancing, but he's a little spastic for my taste.

Kidding aside, I haven't experienced that phenomena yet.
Can you not view it where it's at? Should play normally from the link.
No, it does not work on my phone, sorry.
i wonder what happens if you EVA him. Also, what happens if you select him via the tracking station. He reminds me of silent hill. Oo
That looks like what happens when you try to EVA on Jool, but sped up.
Jerford Kerman drank coffee he found abandoned on the side of the road.
Oh man, the look on his face was KILLING me while I watched that video!!
